goals.description: Process employee salaries accurately and on time, ensuring 100% of employees are paid correctly by the last working day of each month.
Maintain compliance with all applicable tax regulations, achieving zero compliance-related penalties annually.
Manage employee data efficiently, reducing data entry errors by 20% within 3 months.
Generate payroll reports for analysis and auditing, producing all required reports within 1 hour of request 95% of the time.
Integrate payroll with existing HR and accounting systems, completing the integration within 6 months with no data loss.
Maintain system security and data integrity, ensuring zero security breaches per year.
Ensure system scalability to handle payroll for up to [X] employees, maintaining <1 second response time for critical operations.
Manage user access and permissions effectively, ensuring role-based access control is correctly implemented for all users within 1 month.
View payslip online anytime, with 99.9% uptime for payslip access.
Update tax declarations easily, completing updates within 5 minutes.
Receive accurate and timely payments on the agreed-upon date, ensuring no delays in salary disbursement.
